trans-unit.source: Defines the behavior for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.
trans-unit.target: Définit le comportement du <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associé à un <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior> to access the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object in your workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Utilisez <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior> pour accéder à l'objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> de votre service de workflow.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is added by default when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost> is created.
trans-unit.target: L'objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> est ajouté par défaut lors de la création du <xref:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> property to 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: Ce constructeur définit la propriété <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> à 10 minutes.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Non implémenté.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Non implémenté.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Non implémenté.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Non implémenté.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented in <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: Non implémenté dans <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Description du service.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Hôte du service.

trans-unit.source: Configures the workflow service to support the workflow run-time behavior.
trans-unit.target: Configure le service de workflow afin de prendre en charge le comportement d'exécution du workflow.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> extension and configures it for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.
trans-unit.target: Cette méthode crée une extension <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WorkflowRuntimeBehavior.CachedInstanceExpiration%2A> et la configure pour le <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Obtient ou définit une valeur indiquant la durée pendant laquelle une instance de workflow affichant un état d'inactivité est conservée en mémoire.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object indicating how long a workflow instance stays in-memory in the idle state before it is forcibly removed from memory.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> indiquant la durée pendant laquelle une instance de workflow affichant un état d'inactivité est conservée en mémoire.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Description du service.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Hôte du service.

trans-unit.source: Verifies the scheduling service used for workflow services has been added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object and that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object has not started before the call to <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: Vérifie que le service de planification utilisé pour les services de workflow a bien été ajouté à l'objet <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> et que l'objet <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> n'a pas démarré avant l'appel de <see cref="Overload:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject.Open" />.

trans-unit.source: The wrong <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService" /> is registered.
trans-unit.target: Le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowSchedulerService" /> enregistré est incorrect.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtient le <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> associé à un instance de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WorkflowServiceHost" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Objet <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is not initialized before retrieving this property, then a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Si l'objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> n'est pas initialisé avant la récupération de cette propriété, un nouvel objet <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> est créé.
